preqs: Twelve credit points of first-year Arts units.

rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {AMU3787, ATS2787, ATS3787}
(Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ACL1%, AEH1%, AMU1%, ASA1%, ATS1%, AZA1%} and  Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {AMU1277, AMU1278, AMU1328, AMU1329})
Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ACL1%, AEH1%, AMU1%, ASA1%, ATS1%, AZA1%}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {AMU3787, ATS2787, ATS3787}

description: The unit provides further development of the students' skills in critical evaluation in the production of online journalism. By producing a series of multimedia stories, students will further develop the key performance practices of researching, interviewing, writing stories, photography, recording in various media, voice presentation and online presentation. Students will also critically consider the impact and implications of different modes of audience engagement for online journalists, including the ethical and editorial issues with regards to online news production.
